GET:/country: SELECT CountryCode, Name, RegionCode, PhoneCode FROM Countries WHERE Deleted = 0
GET:/country/{id}: SELECT CountryCode, Name, RegionCode, PhoneCode FROM Countries WHERE Deleted = 0 AND CountryCode = ?
PUT:/country/{id}: UPDATE Countries SET Name = ?, RegionCode = ?, Deleted = ?, PhoneCode = ?  WHERE CountryCode = ?
GET:/currency: SELECT CurrencyCode, Symbol, Name FROM Currencies WHERE Deleted = 0
GET:/currency/{id}: SELECT CurrencyCode, Symbol, Name FROM Currencies WHERE Deleted = 0 AND CurrencyCode = ?
PUT:/currency/{id}: UPDATE Currencies SET CurrencyCode = ?, Symbol = ?, Name = ?, Deleted = ?  WHERE CurrencyCode = ?
